title: Side buttons not working only for league
body: Since the most recent windows 10 update my side buttons are not working only for league but for browsing are compleatelly fine,i use my mouse button 4 for camera and mouse button 5 for shop and its really anoying,it was compleatelly fine yesterday(the day after the update)but its not working now.Someone please help me

replies.body: Same here.  Do you have a logitech mouse too or something different?

The hardware or software for the mouse may not resolve it, though tinkering around with logitech settings might prove fruitful.  Otherwise, rolling back the creator update would be the necessary step until the issue is resolved.  Sorry, LostFrost.  :X

http://68.media.tumblr.com/290d0abc9286aac88ade7c429ca70c1c/tumblr_inline_nxhamhN83b1t76nkc_500.gif

It's fine Porocles {{summoner:31}} , cheer up :)
I just need to get used to my new bindings for a bit is all.
I'm more interested in tracking if it's just Logitech or the others too (Razer etc.).
Logitech support hasn't responded through releasing a new driver yet.
please replay if the bug is fixed

We've seen a few reports of some additional mouse buttons not working, and found that the Creator update might be the culprit.  We don't have a fix or workaround to offer right now, aside from rolling back that update in the meantime.
